description.zh: 欧盟医疗器械法规（EU MDR 2017/745）和体外诊断医疗器械法规（EU IVDR 2017/746）的结构化数据，包含关键条款、附录摘要和修正案。
description.en: Structured data for EU Medical Device Regulation (EU MDR 2017/745) and In Vitro Diagnostic Medical Devices Regulation (EU IVDR 2017/746), including key articles, annex summaries and amendments.
